rows.label: bf05040100_0020
rows.name:
Hikari-sama? What are you doing out so
late? Can't you sleep?

rows.label: bf05040100_0030
rows.name:
At this time of year, the nights can be bitter.
Please don't catch a cold.

rows.label: bf05040100_0040
rows.name: I'm a Blade. We don't exactly catch colds.

rows.label: bf05040100_0080
rows.name: I am Fan la Norne, Blade to His Holiness Marveni.

rows.label: bf05040100_0100
rows.name:
Sorry, my mistake. You just reminded
me of somebody I know.

rows.label: bf05040100_0110
rows.name:
...It is quite cold, isn't it? I might
go back to my room, after all.

rows.label: bf05040100_0140
rows.name:
(Hikari-chan, did you see her
Core Crystal's shape?)

rows.label: bf05040100_0160
rows.name: (It's not like with us and Rex, either.)

rows.label: bf05040100_0170
rows.name: (Looks like the number of questions for Marveni went up.)

rows.label: bf05040100_0180
rows.name:
(Sorry... Let's change over.
I have to think.)
